description.value:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the frightened condition.

You serve as an anchor to your close companions, calming them in times of stress. Decrease the value of the triggering ally's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] condition by 1. The ally is then temporarily immune to your Reassuring Presence for 1 hour.
